Package stockmarket.stock

Provides the classes necessary to create Stock objects for this program.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OwnedStock
    This interface extends the Stock interface with methods and fields defining a stock that is owned as part of a stock portfolio.
    Stock
    An interface defining the basic structure of a stock object.
    StockDownloader
    API for module for downloading stock data from a web service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractStock
    An abstract implementation of the Stock interface.
    DefaultOwnedStock
    This implementation of the OwnedStock interface extends the DefaultStock class and builds on it with the properties of the new interface.
    DefaultStock
    Basic stock object with a range of fields that are filled by data from a StockDownloader class.
    HistoricalQuote
    An immutable object containing the closing price of a stock on a particular date.
    StockFileDownloader
    A special variation on the StockDownloader interface, designed to load the stock's data from file.
    StockHistoryList
    Special list class for storing a stock's history.
    YahooStockDownloader
    Implemented StockDownloader utilizing Yahoo!Finance's online service to acquire stock data.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidStockException
    Exception thrown if a Stock instance is unable to download its attributes because the instance's symbol does not correspond to an actual stock.

Package stockmarket.stock Description

Provides the classes necessary to create Stock objects for this program. Stock objects represent real-life stocks traded on the New York Stock Exchange.
Since:
Version 2.0
Author:
Craig
